title: Just realized something.
body: how is there not a twinsword champion yet? I mean project yi has one but project yi is a skin.

replies.body:
I think even project yi doesn't have that,his sword gets a second blade,but he isn't dual wielding anything.

The problem is likely that simple auto-attacks will look rather clunky if the champ has 2 swords.Either he'll have to alternate between the 2 swords or he would attack with both of them every time.

In the past we had {{champion:98}},but now he has 2 swords for different attacks.
twinswords in reference to a handle with a blade on both ends. a twinsword.

Ah ok,misunderstood you then.

Though I guess my reasoning still applies there,it would likely look awkward if the champ either used only side of it the whole time.

with the current animation style you could have the auto cycle be a combo of attacks. in similar fashion to sion, who will always attack with an axe swipe, into a punch, ending in a downward strike with his axe.

With a twin sword it could be a swipe with on blade, into the other blade, into a stab.

With dual wielding it could also follow the principle, hit with one, hit with the other, hit with both.
